power_source_description: Robust, yet simple. Crank the handle make some electricity.
With a clear view of a southern sky, this bad boy could power a small house.
Diesel goes in, electricity and smoke comes out.
Gas goes in, electricity comes out.
Might make some power if the wind is blowing.
Largest electrical generating unit in all of New England.
Actually makes power if there's wind
If you can make steam, you can make power.
Just because the school is closed, doesn't mean it doesn't have a huge solar array.
